guardian.description: Frontline protector who endures and controls space.
guardian.warning: Guardians who ignore threat generation and positioning fail their allies.
guardian.philosophyStatement: Endure so others do not fall.
guardian.mentorQuote: A Guardian stands between darkness and those who cannot defend themselves.

consular.description: Force-focused specialist emphasizing control and mastery.
consular.warning: Consulars who neglect survivability collapse under pressure.
consular.mentorQuote: The Force flows through all things. Master that flow, and you master the battlefield.

sentinel.description: Balanced operative blending combat skill, awareness, and versatility.
sentinel.warning: Sentinels who lack focus risk becoming unfocused generalists.
sentinel.mentorQuote: A Sentinel sees the full board and adapts. Do not mistake balance for indecision.

duelist.description: Precision combatant who ends threats decisively in single combat.
duelist.warning: Duelists who overextend fall quickly when isolated.
duelist.mentorQuote: One strike, perfectly placed, is worth a hundred desperate blows.

healer.description: Support-focused Force user dedicated to preservation and recovery.
healer.warning: Healers who neglect positioning are removed early from combat.
healer.mentorQuote: The greatest power is not in taking life, but in preserving it.

tracker.description: Pursuit specialist who hunts across terrain and finds prey.
tracker.warning: Trackers who lose patience lose their prey.
tracker.philosophyStatement: The hunt requires time and discipline.
tracker.mentorQuote: Speed wins races. Patience wins wars.

infiltrator.description: Stealth operative who moves unseen through hostile territory.
infiltrator.philosophyStatement: Move like shadow. Strike like shadow.
infiltrator.mentorQuote: The best mission is the one no one ever knows happened.

striker.description: Swift offense combatant who hits hard and vanishes.
striker.warning: Strikers who cannot escape are strikers who die.
striker.mentorQuote: Superior firepower means nothing if you're never there when they shoot back.

charmer.description: Persuasion specialist who talks their way out of (and into) anything.
charmer.warning: Charmers who run out of words run out of options.
charmer.philosophyStatement: Every problem can be solved with the right words.
charmer.mentorQuote: You can make 100 credits with a blaster, or 10,000 with a smile.

gambler.description: Risk-taker who makes luck and reads probability better than most.
gambler.warning: Gamblers who play the odds always lose eventually.
gambler.philosophyStatement: The house edge can be beaten, but rarely.
gambler.mentorQuote: If you're not prepared to lose it all, you have no business at the table.

thief.description: Precision specialist who takes what's not theirs with surgical precision.
thief.philosophyStatement: Every lock has a solution. Every system has a flaw.
thief.mentorQuote: The best heist is one where the mark never knows they've been robbed.

commando.description: Squad-focused combatant who coordinates firepower and tactics.
commando.warning: Commandos who lose their squad lose their edge.
commando.mentorQuote: A lone soldier is a dead soldier. Never forget that.

gunner.description: Ranged specialist who maximizes firepower through technique and positioning.
gunner.warning: Gunners caught in close quarters are gunners who die.
gunner.philosophyStatement: Distance is safety. Distance is victory.
gunner.mentorQuote: Keep enemies at range. Problems that can't reach you can't hurt you.

guardian.description: Defensive specialist who holds ground and protects others through positioning.
guardian.warning: Guardians who move lose their defensive advantage.
guardian.mentorQuote: Hold this position. Whatever comes, you don't move. They move, or they fall.

diplomat.description: Negotiator who builds alliances and navigates politics.
diplomat.warning: Diplomats without allies have no power.
diplomat.philosophyStatement: A deal that benefits both sides lasts forever.
diplomat.mentorQuote: Never resort to violence when words can win the day.

leader.description: Authority figure who commands through presence and decisiveness.
leader.warning: Leaders who hesitate lose their followers.
leader.philosophyStatement: Authority without conviction is merely authority.
leader.mentorQuote: Your people follow you because you make the hard choices they cannot.

scoundrel.description: Ambitious schemer who plays politics for personal advantage.
scoundrel.warning: Scoundrels who get caught lose everything.
scoundrel.philosophyStatement: Power comes to those willing to take it.
scoundrel.mentorQuote: The throne belongs to those bold enough to sit in it.
